# ADMX-23 TOVEK Cruiser Hybrid EMP Missile System
A hybrid EMP [color=GreenYellow]missile[/color] pod turret that fires EMPHE warheads to disable and weaken enemy ships at long range.
## Pod Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson] 12 RPM [/color]/[color=deepskyblue] 0.2 RPS [/color] - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]3000 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Power Usage (Passive): [color=turquoise]2500u/s[/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]40000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]1312u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]12500u[/color] - Firing Mode: [color=gold]Automatic[/color]
## Missile Specifications
- Acceleration: [color=mediumspringgreen][bold]80 m/s²[/bold][/color] - Tracking Range: [color=orangered][bold]300m[/bold][/color] - Scanning Arc: [color=teal]50 degrees[/color] - Launch Speed: [color=darkorange]100 m/s[/color] - Max Speed: [color=darkorange]300 m/s[/color] - Range: [color=orange]1260m[/color]
